title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-10.11 - Rivets
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-10.11 - Rivets

State Regulations

When the diameter of the rivet holes in the
longitudinal joints of a boiler is not known, the diameter and cross-sectional
area of rivets, after driving, may be ascertained from Table X-1, or by cutting
out one or more rivets in the body of the joint. Table X-1

Sizes of Rivets Based on Plate

Thickness

N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
14-10.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
